msbt.message: You know, it's funnyâ€”I thought you were Timmy at first. Silly me.I tell you, I'm having a very hard time deciding what I should buy. Good thing I love browsing!
This store has such a delightful variety of items for sale. I just LOVE how eclectic it is! I, for one, find it comforting to know that I can find all sorts of things I might need in one place.
Do you know what I'm doing? Why, I'm shopping for a little reward for myself. I think I deserve it!
Are you here to buy a present? I just love thinking about a friend and finding that perfect gift for them! Oh, , I do hope the present you choose for your friend brings them joy.
Are you here to buy a present today? Don't you just love finding the perfect gift for a friend? It shows you know them deep down. And gifts that come from the heart are the best gifts of all.
I adore shopping when I'm on a trip, don't you? So much to see! So much to buy! I simply must visit the shop on your island one of these days.
Did you find a nice souvenir? I find choosing the perfect keepsake from my travels to be quite stressful.

Nook's Cranny has been remodeled, you know. I can't get over how spacious it is! There are so many wonderful things to shop for too!There's only one problem The Bells are flying out of my purse like never before, !
It's just so spacious in here after the remodel. I feel like I can go on shopping forever, .
Have you seen Timmy and Tommy's new uniforms? <10_4 />So crisp! So sharp! Soutterly adorable!
